title: Does anyone play smite?
body:
I got some convention skins from AVCON for smite.
So let me know on the discussion side of my channel if you want one, dont have to subb or what ever.
Just I would be able to PM you that way if you want it.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8x_OF9Fo1vb8NkaASrXaXQ/discussion

Just say "Skin plz" or something and I'll PM you the code.

replies.body:
I was banned from SMITE for having Cheat Engine running in the background. They refused to unban me because I had 'cheating programs open and was most likely cheating on their game.' Despite the fact that CE wasn't hooked into anything, I simply forgot to close it when it opened on startup. SMITE sucks, though, their anticheat constantly runs on your PC. It gets flagged by so many different things. Let's not forget that if you overclocked your PC you'd also be banned for it and no one was unbanned.

I regret buying a Cupid skin. Fuck SMITE. They don't deserve any of my money, the greedy morons.

So you play games with a cheat engine....

makes you sad to begin with, learn the game without it.

Overclocking is hard to detect, probably time to buy the upgrades rather than just overclock a 3-4year old machine. Cause if you're getting 60fps on hardware that shouldn't and your response times when looking at data really doesn't add up to the FPS you'd likely get, yeah... It is a manner of cheating to be honest. 

Single player who cares, video games aren't supposed to be about the best system wins, its supposed to be an even platform that is based off mechanical and systematic understanding. 

It'd be like playing on a CoD server vs Xbox live players and you're on PC. 

You have a hands down hardware advantage they can't match. Is it fair for the others? No... but and i say this broadly, not just at you... Every loser finds advantages that others can't match. True skill is in an even match, but the player keeps winning anyways.

> [{quoted}](name=ToTaL ViRGiN,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=IOaWEVdK,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-07-25T19:48:40.055+0000)
>
> So you play games with a cheat engine....
> 
> makes you sad to begin with, learn the game without it.
> 
> Overclocking is hard to detect, probably time to buy the upgrades rather than just overclock a 3-4year old machine. Cause if you're getting 60fps on hardware that shouldn't and your response times when looking at data really doesn't add up to the FPS you'd likely get, yeah... It is a manner of cheating to be honest. 
> 
> Single player who cares, video games aren't supposed to be about the best system wins, its supposed to be an even platform that is based off mechanical and systematic understanding. 
> 
> It'd be like playing on a CoD server vs Xbox live players and you're on PC. 
> 
> You have a hands down hardware advantage they can't match. Is it fair for the others? No... but and i say this broadly, not just at you... Every loser finds advantages that others can't match. True skill is in an even match, but the player keeps winning anyways.

I used it in Dynasty Warriors so I'd save myself the trouble of farming for seven hours for a horse to get all 5 and 6 star weapons.

Having 60 FPS isn't cheating. I get, on average, 417FPS on LoL. Am I cheating by having that over someone with 20?

Regardless, I shouldn't have been banned for having CE open, not hooked into game. It was literally just running and because of that, I was banned the moment the game ended because I was using more resources than I should've been and they detected it as cheating.

> [{quoted}](name=Annie Bots Wife,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=IOaWEVdK,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2016-07-26T07:49:11.184+0000)
>
> I used it in Dynasty Warriors so I'd save myself the trouble of farming for seven hours for a horse to get all 5 and 6 star weapons.
> 
> Having 60 FPS isn't cheating. I get, on average, 417FPS on LoL. Am I cheating by having that over someone with 20?
> 
> Regardless, I shouldn't have been banned for having CE open, not hooked into game. It was literally just running and because of that, I was banned the moment the game ended because I was using more resources than I should've been and they detected it as cheating.

I guess the moral of the story is, if you really have to cheat. Close them all before playing anything online.

> [{quoted}](name=ToTaL ViRGiN,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=IOaWEVdK,comment-id=0004000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-26T21:02:59.756+0000)
>
> I guess the moral of the story is, if you really have to cheat. Close them all before playing anything online.

he moral of the story is Hi-Rez is a failure of a company and should get a better anti-cheat.

Yoooo my boy hit me up if you wanna play too
IGN: Prignels
I play Artemis... a lot. and thanks man :D
its for a skin code, to to play with XD

> [{quoted}](name=Yasei Doubutsu,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=IOaWEVdK,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-07-24T10:18:23.745+0000)
>
> its for a skin code, to to play with XD

Hey i dont know if you played smite yourself. the least I can do is offer to play a game if you did :)
Sorry, didint see you, will message you at the end of the day with a skin code.

Have to admit, Smite looks like a real good potential future for MOBA, i used to play original dota with friends zoomed right in for more fun and upclose graphics, more fun team fights when you cant see whats happening behind your champ.

If my laptop was better, i'd play it :( every test and forum says it won't play on it :(

But yes, to anyone that reads.... Smite probably is worth the download and check out if you enjoy MOBA / WoW Style Arena combat games.
I don't play Anubis much but ill take it haha. Appreciate it heaps :)
I love Anubis my fav XD
